DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the incidence of ventilator associated pneumonia and late complications by comparing two different cannulas and two different percutaneous tracheostomy techniques.
DOC.brief_title: Ventilator Associated Pneumonia and Late Complications of Percutaneous Tracheostomy
DOC.detailed_description: This study did not generate the expectations's we've expected, therefore, the analysis was prematurely stopped...
DOC.criteria: all patients on the intensive care unit who receive a tracheostomy. HIV/AIDS use of immunosuppressive with regard to the MRIscan patients who have a pacemaker and/or who are claustrophobic
